article_title: Is it time to do away with daylight saving time?
article_text: Twice a year it’s time for a time change. We “spring ahead” one hour to daylight saving time and “fall back” one hour to standard time.

article_metadata.title: Is it time to do away with daylight saving time? | Bradenton Herald

Twice a year it’s time for a time change.
